attributes.action: Free school meals to any child in full time education
attributes.additional_details: With rising of cost of living some children may only have a meal at school it’s important that the children are feed while they are learning
attributes.background: Give every child up to the age of 16 years old free school meal if in full time education

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for a similar action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/617633
